name: Heading White Black To Earth
description:
being trapped in space kind sucks, but for passengers of the s.s.lost space craft, it is so much worse. not only are they stranded in the desolate black void of space, they have to navigate back without some kind of map, because a big evil space monster named Plt, Cnvience. They have to travel through several fields of deadly asteroids, strange mechanical shooters, and wormholes that will lead them around the universe, perhaps one wormhole might take them home.

A/D = Rotate

Space/W/^ = Forward

S/v = Backward
